messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: Everyone knows that the race to become your next MP will be a close fight between Mark Hunter and the Conservative candidate.

messages.title: My contract with every person in our area
messages.content: I will continue to put local people first; to be there and help, listen to your concerns and stand up for what matters to you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mark Hunter is leading the campaign against cuts to the Greater Manchester police force.
Mark Hunter is at the forefront of the fight to protect and improve our local health services.

Mark Hunter has successfully campaigned for funding for the next stage of the A555 relief road, an upgrade to Cheadle Hulme railway station, improvements to the Kingsway Gatley Road junction, and a stop to plans for the highly controversial Congestion Charge.

Mark Hunter is fighting to protect local jobs. He's worked with the council to deliver the Government's £90m growth fund for the Stockport area and is advocating local jobs from local businesses, along with a fair deal from politicians.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Everyone knows that the race to become your next MP will be a close fight between Mark Hunter and the Conservative candidate.

issues.economy: He's fighting for a £700 income tax cut to help local people make ends meet.
issues.environment: A fairer tax system, renewable energy, and energy efficiency homes.
issues.health: Making a personal commitment to Cheadle's NHS – including fighting for a new centre in Cheadle.

housing.content: A fair deal from the politicians that puts money back in your pocket, ditto for every child and fairer taxes to create jobs by making Britain greener

leaflet.personalStatement: I will continue to put local people first; to be there and help, listen to your concerns and stand up for what matters to you.
leaflet.additionalNotes: See the full version of my contract at my website
